name: perlpoint
unsub: Send an empty email to mailto: perlpoint-unsubscribe@perl.org
summary: PerlPoint allows you to write presentations in your text editor and to generate slides, handouts and more in various formats like HTML, XML, Latex, PostScript and PDF. This list is set up to discuss all PerlPoint related topics, including usage tips and questions, bug reports, feature requests, and translator development.
sub: Send an empty email to mailto: perlpoint-subscribe@perl.org
help: send an empty email to mailto: perlpoint-help@perl.org
